絇字的基本解释

絇
qú
古时鞋上的装饰物。
用布麻丝缕搓成绳索。
网罟的别称。
古代量词，丝五两为一絇。
姓。

絇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
［《廣韻》九遇切，去遇，見。］
(1)古时鞋头上的装饰，有孔，可穿系鞋带。
(2)网罟的别名。
(3)用布麻丝缕搓成的绳索。
(4)量词。

絇字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絇； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页921第15
【廣韻】其俱切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】權俱切，?音劬。【說文】纑繩絇也。【玉篇】履頭飾也。【周禮·天官·屨人註】舄屨有絇有繶有純者，飾也。【儀禮·士冠禮】靑絇繶純。【註】絇之言拘也。以爲行戒，狀如刀衣，鼻在屨頭。【爾雅·釋器】絇謂之救。【註】救絲以爲絇。或曰亦罥名。【疏】絇，屨頭飾。亦罥罟之別名也。　又【廣韻】九遇切【集韻】俱遇切，?音屨。義同。

絇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絇字的起名意思

暂无。

絇
Basic explanation of words
絇
qú
Ornaments on ancient shoes.
Twisted into a rope with cloth hemp strands.
Another name for net kun.
In ancient quantifiers, five silks are one slap.
name.
絇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
["Guangyun" nine encounters cut, go to meet, see. ]
(1) The decoration on the toe of the shoe in ancient times, with holes, can be worn to tie shoelaces.
(2) The alias of Wangkun.
(3) A rope twisted with linen thread.
(4) Quantifiers.
絇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　絇; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Pages: Page 921 15
[Guang Yun] Its all cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] The right all cuts,? Yin 劬. [Said the text] 纑絇絇 also. [Jade articles] Wearing headdresses too. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan·Caoren's Note】The 屦屦 have some 絇絇, some have some pure ones, and they are also decorated. 【Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony】Tian Xiuchun. [Note] Liaozhi's words are also restrained. Thinking of practicing precepts, it looks like a knife suit with the nose on the head. 【Erya·Release Device】Lie is said to be the salvation. [Note] Jiu Si thought it was 絇. Or it's also a name. [Sparse] 絇, 屦 headwear. The nickname of Yiwuwu is also.　[Guangyun] Nine encounters with cut [Jiyun] All encounters with cut,? Yin 屦. The same meaning.

Name meaning
Nothing.
qú
сущ. стар. украшение (орнамент) на носках обуви с петлями для шнурка (завязок)
絇履(屦) обувь с узорчатыми носками
